Summary: Nightime cigar shaped red/orange glowing object dripping fire
divs: sighting detailsyou got somthing wrong with the "county entry" block. so i entered latvia to bypass the erro code. this sighting occured in the united states, california, ventura county. this sighting happend over aproxmately 30 years ago. it was either in 1978 or 1979--i belive it may have been 78. not important, but what i witnessed was important. i am reporting it now because of the internet and my access to high-speed downloads. more importantly i also heard a ufo researcher on the art bell show several years ago talking about the same case--like it was very important. from his witnesse\s point\s of view they were obvserving it facing east--i realized that i was on the opposite side facing west with object fliying between us. have not been able to locate this researcher, but i'm sure someone affiliated with this site will be able to do so. sighting... was a resident of ventura county, ca. at the time. living in port hueneme. was driving home, west bound on the santa paula (126 freeway) when i noticed a orange\red glowing cigar-shaped object flying slowly from the north heading south. i pulled over to the side of the road, got out of the car and watched as the object flew over a freeway overpass in the distance. object appeared about the lenght of the bridge from my vantage point. object slowly pulsed red to a brighter shade of orange. observed flame dripping from the tail of the object. i reached inside the car and flashed my high-beams several times hoping to elicit a response from the object. there was none. i thought at first the object was a naval jet in trouble--with the dripping flame. but i heard no jet noise. i then realize that the object was flying below the stall speed of a jet aircraft. the cigar shapped object continued to fly in a southerly direction towards the point mugu naval air station in the distance. remember seeing the warning lights above mugu rock (leading to the tracking station) in the distance very clearly that night. watched until the light could no-longer could be seen. object did not vary speed or flight path. it made a straight line out to the ocean. made this observation perhaps a mile or so from the highway 118 overpass. in between me and the city of ventura were west saticoy, county center (not there at the time) and the 118 los angeles avenue. i believe the object passed over the 126 freeway somewhere between the 118 bridge and west saticoy. i only caught the tail end of the art bell interview segment--but heard the mention of ventura\saticoy and "cigar shapped" object. and that this occured in the late seventies.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ventura
There were no other sightings in Ventura on or around November 30th 1977
